resources.string: Only one host allowed. See examples.
Only one port allowed. See examples.
Only one command allowed. See examples.
-e option is only supported for TCP.
Start your command with nc. See examples.

OPTIONS:
-l Listen for incoming connections
-p PORT Specify source port
-u Use UDP instead of default TCP
-C Use CRLF for EOL sequence
-e CMD Execute CMD and redirect I/O
Source code: https://github.com/ruvolof/nc-for-android\nPlease use Github to submit bugs or feature requests.
